p: The X-ray diffraction (XRD) spectrums of the four kinds of purified montmorillonite are shown in Figure 1, which shows that the four purified montmorillonites only contain few quartz impurities and can meet the requirements of crystal structure calculation. In addition, the chemical compositions of the four kinds of montmorillonite were analyzed by XRF. According to the chemical analysis results of montmorillonite ( Table 1), the position of various ions in the lattice of montmorillonite and the corresponding crystal formulas were determined [ 29]. The calculation results are given in Table 2. The crystal chemical formulas of the four kinds of montmorillonite were as follows: (Ca 0.16Mg 0.02Na 0.01K 0.01) 0.38(Si 3.98Al 0.02) 4O 10(Al 1.55Mg 0.35Fe 0.10) 2(OH) 2, (Ca 0.25K 0.01) 0.51(Si 3.97Al 0.03) 4O 10(A 1.52Mg 0.43Fe 0.05) 2(OH) 2, (Ca 0.21Mg 0.04Na 0.05K 0.02) 0.57(Si 3.94Al 0.06) 4O 10(Al 1.49Mg 0.41Fe 0.08Mn 0.02) 2(OH) 2, and (Ca 0.26Mg 0.05Na 0.04K 0.03) 0.69(Si 3.94Al 0.06) 4O 10(Al 1.38Mg 0.53Fe 0.07Mn 0.01 Ti 0.02) 1.99(OH) 2, respectively. Therefore, the semi-unit layer charge density of the four kinds of montmorillonite were 0.38, 0.51, 0.57, and 0.69, respectively.
